name: AspNetMvcRoles
tagline: A boilerplate ASP.NET MVC 5 project with role manager for Identity 2.0 enabled.
body: ## For more information on the new Identity framework please check this article out: [ASP.NET MVC and Identity 2.0: Understanding the Basics](http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/762428/ASP-NET-MVC-and-Identity-Understanding-the-Basics)
